Sergey Brin I'd like to mention that I've had a great time working with Larry now for 15 years and Eric Schmidt for a decade. Both of them have inspired and moved me. I would like to work more on my personal passions. There will be several new products I'm working on. I've been accused of vaporware recently, so I won't talk about them yet. But soon. 's relationship to the Administration is particularly timely now in light of the way the Federal Trade Commission closed its probe of the Wi-Spy incident, and the Department of Justice's current review of the pending acquisition of ITA Software. http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/GOOGGovfinal012411.pdf http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/LtrIssa012411final.pdf The report, Lost in the Cloud: Google Inc. and the US Government, is drawn from records obtained through the Freedom of Information Act and interviews.
